description:
Horses, Ponies and more if you like them then you will love to color them. In fact the icon and landing page is what one little girl colored for the app. It is her and her pony. This app comes from a kids point of view first and has a very easy toolset for them to use to color, however if that little boy or girl still exists in you, then there is a more advance palette that you can use to get even more colors to choose from. We have also added in a blank sheet so you can create your own picture to color from scratch. 

What you will get from this app: 

- No ads 
- No up sales 
- Over 55 different coloring choices 
- A Blank Sheet to make your own coloring sheets 
- 2 different Palettes, one simple one advanced 
- Paint Bucket fill 
- Air Brush mode for shadowing and great effects 
- Different Brush sizes 
- Able to save photos to device Photo roll 
- Restart of reset to start over 
- Unlimited Fun
